partners.name: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
partners.description: TCS is one of the largest Indian companies by market capitalization ($80 billion). It is among the 'Big 4' most valuable IT services brands worldwide. In 2015, TCS was ranked 64th in the Forbes World's Most Innovative Companies ranking.

partners.name: Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTS)
partners.description: Cognizant is an American multinational corporation that provides digital, technology, consulting, and operations services. It is listed in the NASDAQ-100 and S&P 500 indices.

partners.name: Infosys
partners.description: Infosys Limited is an Indian multinational corporation that provides business consulting, information technology, and outsourcing services. It is the second-largest Indian IT services company by revenue.

partners.name: Ramco Systems
partners.description: Ramco Systems is a software products and services provider specializing in Enterprise Resource Planning, Human Capital Management, Logistics, and Aviation Maintenance & Engineering Software.

partners.name: ELCOT
partners.description: The Electronics Corporation of Tamil Nadu Limited (ELCOT) promotes, establishes, and runs state public sector enterprises for electronic items and IT-related projects.

partners.name: Navitas (TAKE Solutions)
partners.description: Navitas, the dedicated life sciences company of TAKE Solutions, combines capabilities of a full-service CRO, a technology-led life sciences services provider, and a big data analytics provider.
